definition: affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
ministry/the teaching of a religious leader

sentences.english: Thereby , the basis of penal responsibility of ministration defect sin is varied .
sentences.chinese: 职务过失犯罪刑事责任的根据呈多元性的特点。

sentences.english: Li Chunlin was removed from the post of Director-General of the Price Control Administration of Jiangsu Province.
sentences.chinese: 免去李春林同志的江苏省物价局副局长职务。

sentences.english: Greeting with Iranian, you need to address their surname with their academic or job title.
sentences.chinese: 和伊朗人打招呼，要称他们的姓加上学术或职务头衔。

sentences.english: The results of the appraisal shall be taken as the main basis for appointing or removing reserve officers.
sentences.chinese: 考核结果作为任免预备役军官职务的主要依据。

sentences.english: Earlier this week Kuttner announced he was stepping down from his role
sentences.chinese: 本周早些时候，库特纳宣布将辞去自己的职务。

sentences.english: The company reinstated him as chief engineer.
sentences.chinese: 该公司恢复了他的总工程师职务。

sentences.english: Liu Yaohua was relieved from the post as Chief of the Bureau of Public Security of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 免去柳耀华新疆维吾尔自治区公安厅厅长职务。

sentences.english: Paul said to admit, zhaotian removed his purchasing position.
sentences.chinese: 保言认错，兆天撤去他的采购职务。

sentences.english: He is grooming his son for the directorship of the firm.
sentences.chinese: 他在准备让他儿子担任公司的董事职务。

sentences.english: The official was dismissed from office because he feathered his own nest with the relief fund for flood.
sentences.chinese: 那位官员被解除职务，因为他拿水灾救济金营私自肥。

sentences.english: We was later fired from his command by President Truman.
sentences.chinese: 杜鲁门后来撤销了他的指挥官职务。

sentences.english: The Lawn Tennis Association suspended Mr Castle from the British team.
sentences.chinese: 草地网球协会暂停了卡斯尔先生在英国队的职务。

sentences.english: This course is offered only to those in or preparing for ordained ministry.
sentences.chinese: 本课程只接受已领受或准备领受圣秩职务的人士报读。

sentences.english: A position as data-processing manager that will accredit me to utilize my ability of computer systems.
sentences.chinese: 资料处理经理的职务，能保障我运用电脑系统的常识。

sentences.english: Job-related crimes are an extreme manifestation of corruption.
sentences.chinese: 职务犯罪是腐败现象的极端表现。

definition: to hold several jobs at once/concurrent post/working part-time
to hold an office or post
to transfer/to move to another post
to take over (as minister, manager etc)
to take up a post/to start in a new job
to hold a governmental office or post/to assume office of/to take charge of/to serve as
